## Code Quality Standards

- [ ] CHK001 All code follows established style guides and passes linting
- [ ] CHK002 Static analysis tools have been run and pass without issues
- [ ] CHK003 Code complexity metrics are maintained below required thresholds
- [ ] CHK004 All public interfaces have appropriate documentation
- [ ] CHK005 No code duplication exists (DRY principle followed)

## Testing Standards

- [ ] CHK006 Unit tests achieve minimum 80% coverage
- [ ] CHK007 All unit tests pass before merging
- [ ] CHK008 Integration tests implemented for critical paths
- [ ] CHK009 Integration tests pass successfully
- [ ] CHK010 TDD practices followed where appropriate

## User Experience Consistency

- [ ] CHK011 UI/UX patterns are consistent across the application
- [ ] CHK012 Design system guidelines have been followed
- [ ] CHK013 Accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA) are met
- [ ] CHK014 Responsive design works across all screen sizes
- [ ] CHK015 Performance meets Core Web Vitals good thresholds

## Performance Requirements

- [ ] CHK016 Page load times are under 3 seconds
- [ ] CHK017 Bundle sizes are optimized
- [ ] CHK018 Database queries are efficient
- [ ] CHK019 API responses are optimized
- [ ] CHK020 Resource usage is within acceptable limits

## Security and Privacy

- [ ] CHK021 Secure coding practices have been followed
- [ ] CHK022 Data protection compliance is maintained
- [ ] CHK023 Input validation and sanitization implemented
- [ ] CHK024 Authentication and authorization are secure
- [ ] CHK025 Regular security testing has been performed

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
